data.name: magic
data.comment: "magic" number that always has this value for HexEdit macro files

data.name: header_len
data.comment: Length of header (not including the previous field and this length field)

data.name: plays
data.comment: Number of times the macro is played if called from another macro.

data.name: halt_level
data.comment: Determines the level of erro-condition that will stop the macro

data.name: comment
data.comment: Describes the macro -- shown when the macro file is loaded.

data.name: marker
data.comment: Last byte of the header (always contains 0xCD).

data.name: key_id
